titles.title: It's A Wonderful Day If You Know The King

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It's a wonderful day if you know the king.
A wonderful day to praise Him and sing.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Every burden and care He has promised to bear.
It's a wonderful, wonderful day.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Cast on Him every burden for He careth for you.
He will heal all you heartache.
He's promised that He'll see you through.
